title: url
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

fqdn.description: The fqdn used in the URL (e.g., http://www.woot.com/page.html).

ipv4.description: The IPv4 address used in the URL (e.g., http://1.2.3.4/page.html).

ipv6.description: The IPv6 address used in the URL.

passwd.description: The optional password used to access the URL.

base.description: The base scheme, user/pass, fqdn, port and path w/o parameters.

path.description: The path in the URL w/o parameters.

port.description: The port of the URL. URLs prefixed with http will be set to port 80 and URLs prefixed with https will be set to port 443 unless otherwise specified.

user.description: The optional username used to access the URL.
